item.title: "Still In Love With You" 依然愛你 Official MV - 王力宏 Wang Leehom x Wong Fu Productions
item.description:
"Still In Love With You" 依然愛你 Official MV - 王力宏 Wang Leehom x Wong Fu Productions
Behind the scenes photos and details about the music video: http://bit.ly/nI54Pc "Still In Love With You" 依然愛你 - 王力宏 Wang Leehom http://youtube.com/officialwangleehom Directed by: Wong Fu Productions In Association with Phenomena Productions Assistant Producer: Christine Chen Visual Effects: Derrick Lee With only 1 week to prepare and 1 day to shoot, this was our most challenging yet fulfilling projects yet. We're very proud to share with you this accomplishment. Thank you for your continued support! Lyrics and English translation: 一閃一閃亮晶晶 留下 歲月的痕跡 我的世界的中心 依然還是你 A flash a twinkle of a star Traces our time together Yet the center of my world Still is you  一年一年又一年 飛逝僅在一轉眼 唯一永遠不改變 是不停地改變 A year a year and yet another Time flies by with a blink of an eye/ The only thing that never changes/ Is constant change  我不像從前的自己 你也有點不像你 但在我眼中你的笑 一樣的美麗 I'm not how I was before You're not like you were either But your smile in my eyes Is still beautiful as ever 日子只能往前走 一個方向順時鐘 不知道還有多久 所以要讓你懂 Time only moves forward The clock only turns one way- clockwise Don't know how long we have left So I want you to understand  我依然愛你 就是 唯一的退路 我依然珍惜 時時刻刻的幸福 你每個呼吸   每一個動作 每個表情 到最後 一定會 依然愛你 I still love you, the only path I walk  I still cherish every minute, every moment of happiness Your every breath, every movement, every expression Till the very end, I will always Still love you  我依然愛你   或許是 命中注定 多年之後   任何人都無法代替  那些時光是我這一輩子最美好的 那些回憶   教我如何忘記 I still love you, maybe it's fate  After many years, no one can replace you Those times together were the best times of my life How can I forget all those memories  我依然愛你 就是 唯一的退路 我依然珍惜 時時刻刻的幸福 你每個呼吸  每一個動作 每個表情 到最後 一定會 依然愛你 I still love you, the only path I walk  I still cherish every minute, every moment of happiness Your every breath, every movement, every expression Till the very end, I will always Still love you  I will still love you in the next life time  你每個呼吸   每一個動作 每個表情 到永遠 一定會 依然愛你 Your every breath, every movement, every expression Forever, I will... still love you Thanks for watching. SUBSCRIBE: http://youtube.com/wongfuproductions FACEBOOK: http://facebook.com/wongfuproductions TWITTER OFFICIAL: http://twitter.com/wongfupro TED FU: http://twitter.com/tedfu WESLEY CHAN: http://twitter.com/thewesleychan PHILIP WANG: http://twitter.com/philipwang OFFICIAL: http://wongfuproductions.com STORE: http://areyouaniceguy.com

item.title: ROCK 'n' ROLL 3D (Official Music Video)
item.description:
ROCK 'n' ROLL 3D (Official Music Video)
Download-Link hier: http://tinyurl.com/bm6kqv Es ist uns eine riesige Freude euch dieses Video vorstellen zu können. Es hat viel Spaß gemacht daran zu arbeiten und wie schon im letzten Video auf DieseSchuleRockt erwähnt war es ein richtig aufwendiges Video, an dem Dima ca. 50 Std rumgeschnitten hat. Außerdem wurden extra für dieses Video ungefähr 6.000 Fotos gemacht (das Video besteht hauptsächlich aus Fotos, was man den sogenannten Stop Motion Effekt nennt), von denen dann die besten ausgesucht und einzeln bearbeitet wurden. Das Lied heißt besteht eigentlich nur aus dem Satz "Unser Leben ist Rock 'n' Roll" und es handelt sich nicht um unser Leben (das Leben von Dima und Sascha), sondern um das Leben an sich. Das Leben ist dynamisch wie Rock 'n' Roll, weil sich alles bewegt und verändert... Diese Bewegung wird im Video durch den Stop Motion Effekt erzeugt! Wir wollten einfach etwas neues ausprobieren, was wir bisher noch nicht gemacht haben und das ist daraus geworden... Wir hoffen, dass sich die Mühe gelohnt hat und ihr Spaß an der Musik und am Video habt. Mit Musik haben uns unsere alten Bekannten augeholfen: TALOS. Die werdet ihr schon durch unsere Zusammenarbeit bei dem "BEST DANCE VIDEO EVER" kennen... Wenn nicht, hier ist der Link zum Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bzkqN9jyfOg Und hier geht's zum YouTube-Kanal von Talos: http://www.youtube.com/user/TalosProject P.S.: über euer Feedback würden wir uns sehr freuen.
From: DieAussenseiter
Views: 191138
15380 ratings

item.title: OMG, OMG JOE LAUZON AND MELVIN GUILLARD
item.description:
OMG, OMG JOE LAUZON AND MELVIN GUILLARD
For those that don't know, Joe and I have been talking once or twice a week for the last 6 or 7 months. He's a gamer, he's a computer programmer, and he's a fighter. Joe is a great fighter but his career has been a bit "win one, lose, win one, etc." It seemed like he'd beat the guys below him and simply made incredibly fights against the guys above him. This fight was against Melvin Guillard, arguably the #3 person in the world in his weight class. Joe Lauzon was a 3:1 or 7:2 underdog depending where you looked. Not only did he win but he also took home the submission of the night bonus. If Melvin hadn't tapped Joe could have tightened up that choke and took his Melvin's head home with him too. :) I was so excited about this win I wanted to make a video and capture how I was feeling. This doesn't happen every day. For Joe it will be one of his many life's "wins" and not soon forgotten. Edit: A lot of people have been asking how I know Joe. We were both fans of each other before we met. He replied to something I wrote on reddit and I was psyched that "Joe Freaking Lauzon" just wrote to me. He said he watched PKA a lot in the live stream and shortly after that I noticed him. A short while after that we had him on the show. I was in Boston for PAX East so and Russia, Kitty, and I went to Joe's gym to film a fight. Since then we've chatted on Skype about once a week, sometimes less, sometimes more. He's one of the world's good guys and I pull for him to do well in his life. Like My Page: http://facebook.com/woodysgamertag Twitter: http://twitter.com/woodysgamertag Google+: http://gplus.to/woodysgamertag Tumblr: http://woodysgamertag.tumblr.com T-Shirts: http://woodysgamertag.spreadshirt.com Twitch.tv: http://twitch.tv/woodysgamertag AppRat: http://apps.facebook.com/woodysgamertag
